tasks.description: Wish the cashier at your local supermarket a nice day
Ask somebody where the next postbox is
Ask someone for a tissue
Ask a stranger what the current time is
Ask the bus driver if the bus has the main station on its route
Make a reserviaton for your favorite restaurant by phone call
Ask a stranger where the city hall is
Make eye contact with a person you would like to talk to
Visit a cafe on your own and order something
Ask somebody to take a picture of you in front of a sight (or a building of your choice)
Join a new club/activity
Make a stranger a compliment about his/her clothes
Ask a stranger what his/her favorite restaurant is and where you can find it because you are new in town
Visit the cinema on your own
Try to have smalltalk with somebody you do not know at a party
Ask a stranger for a small amount of money (for example for a train ticket)
Present a topic you are interested in to a group of friends
tasks.category: Speaking in Public/Talking with people in authority

tasks.description: Pay for someones drink at your local bar
tasks.category: Speaking in Public/Talking with people in authority

tasks.description: Ask a police officer about the way/ where you can park for free
tasks.category: Speaking in Public/Talking with people in authority

tasks.description: Give your opinion in class or in a meeting
tasks.category: Speaking in Public/Talking with people in authority

tasks.description: Make a telephone call in a bus and talk over 10 minutes
tasks.category: Speaking in Public/Talking with people in authority

tasks.description: Ask an employee at a store for a discount
tasks.category: Speaking in Public/Talking with people in authority

tasks.description: Ask someone you find attractive for a pen
Smile at an attractive stranger on the street
Ask a workmate or a fellow student you find attractive for something university or work related
Make eye contact with a person you find attractive
Compliment a person you find attractive
Tell somebody you are interested in that you would like to get to know them better
Ask a person you find attractive if you can sit next to him/her in the bus/train
Ask someone you find attractive for his/her number
Ask someone you find attractive if you want to have lunch together
Ask a friend for advice in your love life
Tell someone about an embarrassing moment in your life
Eat alone in a cafeteria/restaurant
Tell a friend in person that you want to cancel a gathering because you do not want to go there
Dance funny at a party
Drop something not valuable in front of others
Say that you lost your phone and ask someone that you need to make an urgent call
Make a bad joke
Ask your supervisor/teacher/lecturer for feedback about your performance
Ask a senseless question in class or at work and be confident about it
Write a bad review about a product you did not like
tasks.category: Assertive expression of annoyance, disgust or displeasure

tasks.description: Start a polarizing discussion with a person you do not know so well
tasks.category: Assertive expression of annoyance, disgust or displeasure

tasks.description: Decline a task you do not want to do at work or at university

tasks.description: Tell a close friend what bothers you about him/her
